item.title: About ✝️
item.description: A Traditional Catholic devoted to traditions East and West. Saint Gregory Palamas, Blessed Duns Scotus, Saint Thomas Aquinas, Ora Pro Nobis. God bless the Latin Mass societies and may we always be faithful to Peter.
